channel.title: quiz on [unfold] Bits of awareness
channel.description: Recent content in quiz on [unfold] Bits of awareness

item.title: Same entity, different type?
item.description: Is(/are) there any scenario(s) where a name, which refers to an entity, actually refers to a different types (whilst still referring to the same entity) depending on context and/or scope? Or, to put it in another way, is(/are) there any scenario(s) where the type of a named entity changes depending on context and/or scope?
